title: 如何给自己一个已经装载弹射物箭的弩
author: 阡喏
txt_content: 如何给自己一个已经装载弹射物箭的弩

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 もぺもぺ 于 2020-5-10 12:48 编辑 

/give @s crossbow{ChargedProjectiles:[{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:1b}],Charged:1b}

replies.author: 晴路卡
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 晴路卡 于 2020-5-10 12:57 编辑 
/give @s crossbow{ChargedProjectiles:[{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:1b}],Charged:1b,Damege:0}
/replaceitem entity @s weapon.mainhand crossbow{ChargedProjectiles:[{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:1b}],Charged:1b,Damege:0}复制代码二选一
